text: Anātai(p peṇkaḷait tirumaṇam ceytu avar)kaḷiṭam nīṅkaḷ niyāyamāka naṭakka muṭiyātu eṉṟu payantīrkaḷāṉāl, uṅkaḷukkup piṭittamāṉa peṇkaḷai maṇantu koḷḷuṅkaḷ - iraṇṭiraṇṭākavō, mum'mūṉṟākavō, naṉṉāṉkāvō. Āṉāl, nīṅkaḷ (ivarkaḷiṭaiyē) niyāyamāka naṭakka muṭiyātu eṉṟu payantāl, oru peṇṇaiyē (maṇantu koḷḷuṅkaḷ), allatu uṅkaḷ valakkaraṅkaḷukkuc contamāṉa (ōr aṭimaip peṇṇaik koṇṭu) pōtumākkik koḷḷuṅkaḷ - ituvē nīṅkaḷ aniyāyam ceyyāmaliruppataṟkuc culapamāṉa muṟaiyākum
